text: And Gaal continued to speak and said, Behold, a people comes down 9. 37 Or, by the sea. A double rendering, perhaps to מעס, the first κατὰ θάλασσαν - the second, ὐπὸ τοῦ ἐχόμενα.westward from the part bordering on the middle of the land, and another company comes by 9. 37 Alex. translates the words “the way of the oak of the seers.”the way of Helon Maonenim.
